project_abstract.cdata: The overall objective of the Health Services Modernization Project is to assist in expanding access to and improving the quality and efficiency of, ambulatory and hospital services, by developing new health care organization, financing and managerial models in selected provinces and municipalities. The project, in conjunction with the II Social Development Project - Health and Nutrition (FASBASE Project - Ln. 3510-EC), is expected to contribute to the improvement of health status of the poor in the medium term, particularly mothers and children under 5 years of age. The components include: (a) decentralized health systems; (b) hospital modernization; (c) policy development, human resources management, and consensus building; and (d) project administration.
